entry.title: Blvck Cash Cannon
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Accessories
Price: 15.00 - 90.00 (2 variants)

Unveiling the Blvck Cash Cannon: an elegant weapon that unleashes an avalanche of notes. Included are 100 Blvck Teddy notes, making it the ultimate party accessory for sending bills soaring through the air. Get creative and fill it with flyers, coupons or other exclusive items. 

The deluxe Black Cash Cannon is elegantly presented in a stylish Black Box and comes with a set of refined notes.

Additionally, you have the opportunity to purchase extra refills of 100 notes.

entry.title: Blvck x Memeland Notebook
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Accessories
Price: 50.00

Step up your note-taking game with the luxe 'Blvck x Memeland' Notebook.

Crafted with a knock-out hardback design and soft-touch, matte black finish, this notebook will be the envy of everyone.

You'll find 128 blank pages (80gsm paper) inside with lines to be able to easily draw or write your thoughts. We've even thrown in 7 pencils so you can get started right away. -

Blvck A5 Notebook: 128 Pages & Size: A5 format

With this notebook, taking notes, creating art, or drawing will be a luxurious treat for your hands.

Price: 60.00

Channeling a Blvck summer style, the Blvck Branded Bucket hat is reversible with one minimalistic side with the Blvck logo on it and the other side full monogram in UV glossy black for an effortlessly cool feel. It's detailed with black logo straps

One size fits most. Comes with a size adjuster.

100% Nylon.

entry.title: Blvck Business Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Accessories
Price: 60.00

Product is personalised and made on demand. Shipping takes 3-4 weeks from the order.

Introducing a sleek, minimalistic Blvck Business Card with fully integrated NFC technology.

Personalise your card in the Blvck Style and make a lasting impression.  

Our business cards are the perfect way to communicate with new friends and potential business connections alike - giving you complete marketing and networking versatility. Now you are no longer confined to the four corners of a paper business card. You can instantly share contact details, websites, socials, videos and much more.

How to install it: 

Step 1: Purchase your Blvck NFC Card and customise it with the name you would like it to appear on the card. Once purchased, look out for a confirmation email from us. 

Step 2: Set Up your Blvck Profile. Add your contact details, social media accounts and more.

Step 3 Receive your card & start tapping. 

Refer to our blog post on how to activate your card once received, here. 

Benefits of a Blvck NFC Business Card:

- Share your details instantly in just one tap. 

- Edit your contact details anytime online without having to print countless business cards.

- Eco-friendly.

- Make a lasting impression. Impress your new connections with this card.

entry.title: Bold Pet Hoodie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Accessories
Price: 75.00

Introducing the first pet collection of our 'Essential' Blvck clothing for pets. Our 'Bold Hoodie' features a logo on the back that gives a defining look to any outfit.

Made from luxurious 100% Terry Cotton, all our hoodies are super soft to the touch and perfect for everyday wear.

Size Guide

 1. Please measure the size of your dog and compare to the size chart before placing an order

2. Please size up if your dog’s size is between two sizes

Blvck is thrilled to unveil the signature 'Blvck Lilith Bag', crafted from luxurious leather to carry all your daily necessities.

Experience the ultimate style and function with our Blvck Lilith Bag. Crafted from luxurious black leather, this leather bag features a striking customized metal plate featuring our iconic Blvck Paris logo. Elevate your look and make a statement with every step.

entry.title: Blvck Monogram MacBook Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: High-Tech
Price: 60.00

With the Blvck Monogram MacBook Skin, your device will never look the same. Made from premium materials, and laser cut to offer the best fit the Blvck MacBook Skin adds a touch of elegance to an otherwise generic design.

Upgrade your lifestyle today and wrap your MacBook in our luxurious Blvck MacBook Skin! 

Please note that this is a skin that you apply as a sticker to your MacBook (not a case) and that a spacing of 1-2mm may be visible on the edges once applied.

Package Included
-One top body skin Cover
-One keyboard/trackpad surround cover
-One bottom skin Cover
